cmput301f13t10.model

Class SectionModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmput301f13t10.model.SectionModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class SectionModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A section of an adventure. Contains media to be displayed, and a list of choices that the reader can take to continue in the adventure.
    Author:
    Brendan Cowan
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • moveMedia

        public void moveMedia(int index,
             int offset)
               throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Move a media in the list of media by a given offset
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the media to move
        offset - The offset to move the media by. A positive number moves it foreward; a negative number moves it backwards.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - If the offset provided would result in the media being moved out of the array.
